attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Save the Wader campaigns to protect a vulnerable species of bird whose numbers are in sharp decline.

Wading birds are part of our national heritage; quietly iconic, the call of a curlew is spine tingling – but this is an increasingly rare sound as waders of all types are in danger of disappearing throughout much of the country.

We believe that it is about time something was done to stop this happening; reversing the decline of once common and widespread species must remain a key challenge in bird conservation.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "publicly acknowledge the plight of the wader and accept the role of predator control and a fair balance of species in reversing the decline in numbers."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
